mutants.code:
def max_area(heights):
    max_area = 1
    left = 0
    right = len(heights) - 1
    while left < right:
        width = right - left
        h = min(heights[left], heights[right])
        area = width * h
        max_area = max(max_area, area)
        if heights[left] < heights[right]:
            left += 1
        else:
            right -= 1
    return max_area
